艵字的基本解释

艵
pīng
縹色。
古同“頩”。

艵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pīng］
［《廣韻》普丁切，平青，滂。］
同“頩1”。
美貌。一说，作色、变色貌。

艵字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【色字部】　艵； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1014第11
【唐韻】普丁切，音砰。【說文】䌁色。【楚辭·九章】玉色艵以晚顏兮。　又【集韻】普迥切，音頩。義同。

艵字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
艵字的起名意思

暂无。

艵
Basic explanation of words
艵
pīng
Ethereal.
The ancient same "頩".
艵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pīng］
["Guang Yun" Pu Ding cut, flat green, peng. ]
Same as "頩1".
Beautiful. In one word, coloring, discoloration and appearance.
艵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Color Word Department] 　艵; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1014-11
【Tang Yun】Putting cut, the sound is banging. [Said the text] Not color. [Songs of the Chu Nine Chapters] The jade color looks like a night look.　[Jiyun] Pu Jiong cut, sound. The same meaning.
